message: This is a much more friendly place for discussions (plus Google Groups isn't supportd no more, no..?)
I dig it, but it doesn't (yet) work well on ipads or mobile devices.
and there are long-form discussions that can't be had here

Well, iPhone/iPad support has already been added to Convore. What about browser-mobile? Anybody checked?

+, syntax highlighting is already working.

We also have email notification,

And I find long discussions here way more ordered than the google groups.

So, any other statements against Convore? :)
